Get the ActiveMQ feature descriptors

Using the Karaf shell: karaf> features:addurl http://repo1.maven.org/maven2/org/apache/activemq/activemq-karaf/5.5.1/activemq-karaf-5.5.1-features.xml karaf> features:install activemq-broker karaf> activemq:create-broker -t blueprint

By default, JMS/Openwire (as is used by Fedora's messaging service) traffic will be serviced by this new broker at port 61616.
